thread.title: Drake Gives Young Thug Diamond-Studded YSL Chain
thread.title_full: Drake Gives Young Thug Diamond-Studded YSL Chain

author: Zakk Feig
title: Drake Gives Young Thug Diamond-Studded YSL Chain
text:
Home > Music > Drake Gives Young Thug Diamond-Studded YSL Chain Drake Gives Young Thug Diamond-Studded YSL Chain 2 2 Posted by Zakk Feig , Feb 25, 2017 at 09:19pm Drake and Young Thug have a close relationship. 
Drake has been quite the gift giver these days, making headlines last year for buying 21 Savage a Ferrari for his birthday. Tonight it's Young Thug who is on the receiving end of the gift train. 
Taking to Instagram, Thugger posted a video of his new diamond-studded YSL chain with the caption, "Thanks @champagnepapi #MORELIFE." 
The two rappers are currently touring together on Drake's Boy Meets World Tour. 
Check out Young Thug's IG video below, and let us know your thoughts in the comments. How much would you estimate that chain is worth? A post shared by ""JEFFERY"" (@thuggerthugger1) on Feb 25, 2017 at 4:44pm PST
